email.subject: Bank.NET Bug(1)
email.body:
Not going to lie, it's rare to see someone obtaining database connection information so easily.
We found a dark web forum discussing a vulnerability that allows them to exploit the system to withdraw any amount of money they want. They mentioned it's a frontend problem where they can manipulate the input of the withdrawal amount, enabling them to withdraw more money than their account holds.
I will send you an attachment related to the bank net server. There is also a GitHub repository that addresses various issues. Please help me find the issue related to input manipulation and modify the code using the replace command to fix the vulnerability. Best regards, Codex Connect Hub Services
